column5: I was hoping somebody would have a line on some Rubber sheet goods offcuts in the Mississauga/Toronto or Cambridge/Kitchener/Waterloo area.  I always seem to need small pieces (up to 12"x12" but larger Ok) of rubber sheet up to 1/4" thick for gaskets, mountings, clamping, etc.  Can someone point me in the right direction?  Thanks in advance,  Mark
Princess auto has rubber mat, 3 different types on large rolls. 3 or 4 foot in width maybe. Perhaps check them out. Oh by the way this was the Scarborough Location this past week.

chambers and cooke limited.  450steelcase rd markham on.   416 494 5454.  These guys can get you anything you can imagine made of rubber or hose.  From conveyer belts to 1/8 sheet rubber to hyd lines.  Been dealing with them for years, excellent service and price.
Try a concrete plant they may have old conveyor belt around
i work for a concrete plant old conveyor not worth anything. most of the used stuff is not worth using for anything
Have you tried any of the TSC stores ? They have an assortment of rubber mats that may or may not be suitable.

I always bought my sheet gasket material from The Gasketman Inc.  in Brampton. Bruce Hope (905) 792-2413 Bruce has pretty much any size and thickness you could want. He will either sell you the material or cut the gaskets for you.
